title: WHAT THE F*CK RIOT?
body: I queue up for a ranked match, get a couple dodges as usual, and when I finally get into a game that no is going to leave my timer freezes and I get a fking dodge penalty. WHAT THE F*CK. I am so pissed right now. The worst part is my screen unfreezes to show me the last half a second of champ select. I didn't lag out, I checked.

replies.body: That's a pretty crappy situation, sorry to see you going through this. :(  Normally this kind of freezing can result from a desync, usually network related especially on wireless.  Just in case, you may want to also try running the client in [low spec mode](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png) in case there's too much stress on the system.  Try a [power cycle ](https://kb.netgear.com/19755/How-to-Power-Cycle-Your-Home-Network?cid=wmt_netgear_organic)as well as the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help rule out some possibilities, but do this in a custom game so the dodge timer doesn't keep escalating.

I opened my task manager while this was occurring and I was at 25% cp usage so I really don't think this has anything to do with my connection. In addition, I was still able to browse YouTube and use the internet while this was happening. Would it be blasphemous if I said this may be client related?

Maaaan. I've been seeing the client do some pretty dumb shit lately. Like some times when I click a champ it lags for like a second or two. One time I picked draft mdoe and some how ended up in poro king.

I just got the same thing and got a 25 minute queue dodge timer. This is bullshit. I understand it takes Riot time to reply but I feel like half the time nothing can be done. I am on the verge of quitting.
